name: Hit The Strike Bowling
description:
Have fun while playing the free bowling and invite your friends to play bowling with you as well. Hit The Strike Bowling is a game app to teach bowling for kids. This bowling game is ranked among the goodgames so have a bu at this free bowling game. Blow the bottles with your best bolling skills to bu around in your friends. Show them the clean strike playing this moji bowling game. All the bowling games reward you for the clean strike to blow all the bottles at once.
Features:

- 3D graphics and physics
- Exciting sound effects
- Score leaderboard, share score with g+ friends
- Unlock achievements
- Multiple balls of different weight
